div.name: R0RTY3JpcHQ=
div.literal_block:
var box = AABB(Vector3(0, 0, 0), Vector3(2, 4, 8))
print(box.get_longest_axis()) # æ‰“å° (0, 0, 1) print(box.get_longest_axis_index()) # æ‰“å° 2 print(box.get_longest_axis_size()) # æ‰“å° 8

section.paragraph: è¿”å›è¯¥è¾¹ç•Œæ¡†çš„ size çš„æœ€é•¿è½´çš„ç´¢å¼•ï¼ˆè§ Vector3.AXIS_Xã€Vector3.AXIS_Y å’Œ Vector3.AXIS_Zï¼‰ã€‚
Returns the shortest normalized axis of this bounding box's size, as a Vector3 (Vector3.RIGHT, Vector3.UP, or Vector3.BACK).

div.name: R0RTY3JpcHQ=
div.literal_block:
var box = AABB(Vector3(0, 0, 0), Vector3(2, 4, 8))
print(box.get_shortest_axis()) # Prints (1, 0, 0) print(box.get_shortest_axis_index()) # Prints 0 print(box.get_shortest_axis_size()) # Prints 2

div.name: QyM=
div.literal_block:
var box = new Aabb(new Vector3(0, 0, 0), new Vector3(2, 4, 8));
GD.Print(box.GetShortestAxis()); // Prints (1, 0, 0) GD.Print(box.GetShortestAxisIndex()); // Prints 0 GD.Print(box.GetShortestAxisSize()); // Prints 2
